ValidationRule.description: If Recurring? checkbox is checked then user must need to fill Frequency field & If checkbox is unchecked then User can not select Frequency field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(Recurring__c = True, IF(ISBLANK( TEXT(Frequency__c) ),TRUE,False),IF( NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT(Frequency__c) )),TRUE,FALSE ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Recurring checkbox is checked then user must need to fill Frequency field & If checkbox is unchecked then User can not select Frequency field.
